categories: Mounts and sensors for bike computers
description: Take your GPS to the streets or to the trails. Just snap it into this bike mount and you're ready to ride.Comes with four cable ties.Fits up to 2.5cm diameter handlebars.Fits Garmin® Oregon, Colorado, Dakota, Approach, Astro, inReach, GPSMAP 62/64, and  eTrex 10, 20, 30/30X, and Touch models.
name: Garmin Handlebar Mount
